summary: This adds a group of singers to the Four Shields Tavern singing the song 'Parting Glass' as preformed by Peter Hollens
descriptionHtml:
As I was listening to Parting Glass preformed by Peter Hollens, I decided that it would sound great in Skyrim, so I asked if I could use it.

Unfortunately, the individual tracks were not available, which means that all of these singers 'sing' exactly the same. 
They can be found in Four Shields Tavern. I chose this tavern because I think it is the least used one by modders. 

Credits:
Obviously, all the credits go to Peter Hollens for preforming this song, and allowing me to use it. 
Also, credits should go to the one who wrote the piece, but that person unfortunately is unknown...

Bugs:
- Sometimes, the lines of music are not being played at the same time. I think it has to do with Skyrim having to load all the pieces of music, and if it also has to do a lot of other stuff, it loads the pieces a slight bit after one another. 
I tried to fix it as much as possible, but it sometimes does load right, and sometimes doesn't. 
- I intented on making it so that you can ask them to sing it again, and while you can ask it, they (probably) don't sing it again. I am still trying to figure out why that is. 
-Something beyond my reach to repair is the fact that there are some pauses in the song. This has to do with the way skyrim handles dialogue. I would have added the whole song in one piece, but that caused CTD's.
author: ErianDragonborn

files.name: Parting Glass preformed by Peter Hollens
